entry.title: Stroller Straps
entry.summary:
Vendor: Béis Travel
Type: Diaper Bag
Price: 18.00

Description
Pretty simple - turn any bag - with d-rings that you would normally strap a removable strap to - and turn it into a diaper bag. All you need is our Tote Insert and these Stroller Straps and you've pretty much just made your own innovative mom (or dad) on the go bag!
Specifications
Dims: 10" Loop
Materials: Poly Webbing with silicone grip
Care: Spot Clean
Weight: 0.25lbs

 
Details
EXTERIOR
- logo straps with snap hooks to wrap around stroller handles and connect any diaper bag with d-rings
- silicone grip on poly webbing prevents slippage
PERFECT FOR
-Baby Needs
-Travel
-Work Tote
-Carry-on

entry.title: The Pumping Backpack
entry.summary:
Vendor: Béis Travel
Type: Diaper Bag
Price: 88.00

Description
Believe it or not, the BEIS office is no stranger to the whirring sound of a breast pump. We are pretty open about our needs when it comes to how we tote around our stuff and the need to have a place to stash your breast pump was not lost on this team! The genius lies in the fact that this doubles as Mama's work bag, comes with a removable pouch for storing parts, keeping them separate, easy to grab and clean as well as the bonus of not looking like you're carrying around a glorified milk-machine! We've added an insulated compartment in this backpack to easily and safely get that liquid gold from point A to point B.
Specifications
Dims: 14" W x 16" H x 7" D
Materials: Body: Nylon Twill, Trim: Buffalo PU, Jelly PVC (Pouch), Lining: 100% Poly, Hardware: Zinc Alloy
Care: Spot Clean
Weight: 2.5lbs

 
Details
EXTERIOR
- compartment specifically for your pump ( fit's most pumps)- with a zipper opening
to feed tubes through on the exterior and an opening to feed the power cord through
- padded shoulder straps
- top handles - easy to grab and go
- 4 exterior slip pockets
- trolley sleeve
INTERIOR
- interior zip pocket
- padded laptop sleeve
- 2 interior slip pockets
- comes with water proof zip pouch
PERFECT FOR
-Baby Needs
-Travel
-Work Tote
-Carry-on

entry.title: The Changing Organizer
entry.summary:
Vendor: Béis Travel
Type: Diaper Bag
Price: 38.00

Description

When you are always on-the-go - even within your own home - a portable changing pad is a must have! Roomy enough to go from newborn to toddler, padded to provide a protective and comfortable landing space for your little one and folds up to a compact accessory that can go from nursery, to living room, to car, to changing room, anywhere, because we know THAT is not on a schedule!
Specifications

Dims: 21" W x 35" L x 0.5" H
Body: Nylon Twill, Trim: Buffalo PU, Poly Mesh, Lining: 100% Poly
Care: Spot Clean
Weight: 2lbs
Details

EXTERIOR
- larger, portable changing pad
- folds up into easy to grab and go
- wristlet strap with snap for easy carry or to loop around a bag or stroller handle
INTERIOR
- mesh pocket for diapers
- zip pocket for wipes
PERFECT FOR
-Baby Needs
-Travel

entry.title: The Tote Insert
entry.summary:
Vendor: Béis Travel
Type: Diaper Bag
Price: 58.00

Description
While our original thoughts when designing this diaper bag insert were for Mums who want all the organization but to still keep their stylish bags - we realized while testing - just how amazing it is for everyone. Especially to keep that tote you're traveling with organized and in a pinch take out the insert and use the tote for shopping, a beach day, and an extra bag on-the-go! Designed to give you the absolute MOST organization, The Tote Insert, has an abundance of pockets, a padded laptop sleeve, our token key fob, a microsuede lined pocket for sunglasses, and a removable insulated bag for milk, snacks, your lunch, or a refreshing beverage.
Shay's Inspo

"I’ve really outdone myself with this one! Can I say that? Meet the Tote Insert. This is perfect for people who like to switch up their bags every now and again, but who don’t want to go through the rigmarole of taking everything out over and over. This bag ensures that all of your essentials are with you no matter what (BÉIS) bag you want to use."-Shay

Details


A POCKET FOR EVERYTHING

With this diaper bag organizer, there are endless ways to create the perfect way to organize all your baby's and your needs.

TRAVEL FRIENDLY

Regardless if you're going on a long trip or from the couch to the counter - this diaper bag insert makes the perfect companion to keep everything organized in your tote and everywhere in between!

ADAPTABLE

Make any tote bag a diaper bag for anyone who loves to have it all together. Padded Laptop Sleeve: 14.25" W x 9.25" H; Fits most 15" laptops

entry.title: The Backpack Diaper Bag
entry.summary:
Vendor: Béis Travel
Type: Diaper Bag
Price: 138.00

Description

The anti-diaper diaper bag backpack is the perfect accessory with enough function to tote around all your baby-mama needs and chic enough that NO ONE will ever suspect that you're carrying around a week-old dirty diaper! Complete with every essential needed for that dreaded diaper change; a changing pad with a diaper and baby wipes pocket, an odor-proof pouch, a teething ring to keep the babe from squirming, and a pacifier pouch to easily reach that must-have baby plug! These diaper bag backpacks are the ultimate lifesaver for any busy mom that's always on the go.
Specifications

Dims: 12" W x 15" H x 7.75" D
Materials:
Body: Nylon Twill
Trim: Buffalo PU,
Jelly PVC (Accessories)
Silicone (Teething Ring)
Lining: 100% Poly
Zinc Alloy Hardware
Care: Spot Clean
Weight: 4lbs
Details

EXTERIOR
- 5 Exterior pockets(2 slips, 2 slips with magnetic closure, 1 zip) (one pocket to hold changing pad)
- Trolley sleeve with option to use as a zip pocket
- Removable/Interchangeable padded shoulder strap
- Removable/Interchangeable padded chain strap
- Removable/Interchangeable adjustable strap with shoulder pad
- Breakaway zipper for easy access to interior
- Snaps on sides to reduce/expand size
- Metal feet on bottom to protect from wear & tear
INTERIOR
- Removable stroller straps
- Tabs for stroller caddy (sold separately)
- Key Fob
- Pacifier pouch included
- Odor Proof bag (for dirty diapers/clothing)
- Portable changing pad with slip pocket for diapers & wipes
- Teething ring
- Insulated drawstring pocket for bottles
- Padded Laptop sleeve with magnetic closure 12" W x 13" H; fits most 16" laptops
- 2 large slip pockets
- 1 large zip pocket

entry.title: The Stroller Caddy
entry.summary:
Vendor: Béis Travel
Type:
Price: 34.00

Description

Designed for moms on-the-go, keeping the babe's and your needs at your finger-tips from park to plane! The Stroller Caddy features adjustable straps that snap around the handle of your stroller, a shopping cart, or around the metal brackets of a plane's seatback tray. A removable, adjustable shoulder strap on this stroller caddy makes it easy to take with you and all the pockets include a mesh dump-all compartment, because we know sometimes you gotta make a quick exit! Bonus Feature: we hid tabs in The Diaper Bag that the caddy can easily snap into for a little extra organization!
Specifications

Dims: L: 19", W: 1". H: 14"
Materials: Nylon Twill, Brushed Ice Gold Hardware, Poly Lining, Poly Mesh
Water resistant protective finish
Care: Spot Clean, Dry Flat
Weight: .5lbs
Details

 

EXTERIOR
- 2 bottle pockets with elasticized opening
- 2 zip compartments
- 1 zip pocket
- 1 slip pocket
- adjustable removable shoulder strap strap - for taking with you
- 2 adjustable straps to hook over your stroller or into The Diaper Bag
- Large mesh compartment for loose things with snaps up to become compact
- 2 elastic loops

Vendor: Béis Travel
Type: Diaper Bag
Price: 168.00

Description

The anti-diaper diaper bag, a shoulder bag with plenty of room and function to tote around all your baby-mama essentials and chic enough that NO ONE will ever suspect you're carrying around a week old dirty diaper! Complete with every essential needed for that dreaded diaper change; changing pad with a zippered pocket for an extra diaper and baby wipes, an odor-proof pouch, a teething ring to keep the baby from squirming and a pacifier pouch to easily reach that must have plug! And there's MORE! This baby comes with 4 different sets of interchangeable straps; stroller straps, an adjustable shoulder strap, 2 flat shoulder straps and chain straps for when you're feeling fancy! Still not sold? entry.title: The Bottle Cooler
entry.summary:
Vendor: Béis Travel
Type:
Price: 28.00

Description

You're getting cooler! We designed this must-have baby accessory to keep your babe's bottles at just the right temp, perfect for moms on the go. Ice packs are included with this baby bottle bag to keep things cool until you need to warm them to the babe's liking. This insulated baby bottle bag keeps bottles cool or warm for several hours. A small zip pocket for bottle accessories and an ID window ensures no one steals the babe’s lunch!
Specifications

Dims: L: 6.75", W: 3.75", H: 13"
Materials: Nylon Twill, Brushed Ice Gold Hardware, Water resistant zippers, Water resistant protective finish
Care: Spot Clean, Dry Flat
Weight: 1.08lbs
Details

EXTERIOR
- zip pocket for small items
- ID window with ID cards to personalize
- Removable strap that can snap over stroller bar for handsfree toteing
- Large BEIS logo
INTERIOR
- Insulated to keep things cool or warm for several hours (up to .... hours)
- Ice pack included
PERFECT FOR
- Baby Needs
- Snacks
- Travel
